name: 妖怪俱乐部 Demon Club
description: Realizing the dream of being a demon king in childhood "Demon Club" is a game based on chinese mythology. It is envisioned on an overhead continent called "ShenZhou". The player is a demon with no power.
minimum_requirements: OS: window7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX960 DirectX: Version 11 Additional Notes: display resolution 1920x1080
recommended_requirements: OS: window10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX1060 DirectX: Version 11 Additional Notes: display resolution 2560x1440
